name: @prague/flow-app
description: App hosting experimental flow-editor for collaborative journaling.
author: Microsoft

scripts.dev: cd ../flow-document && npm run publish-patch-local && cd ../flow-editor && npm run publish-patch-local && cd ../table-document && npm run publish-patch-local && cd ../table-view && npm run publish-patch-local && cd ../flow-app && webpack-dev-server
